metadata.title: CVE-2018-14361 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. nntp.c proceeds evenif memory allocation fails for messages data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14361` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20180716+dfsg.1-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: neomutt package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
